meanings.sent1: I will precompute the results before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: It is helpful to precompute the expenses for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: Why don't we precompute the dinner menu for the week?
meanings.sent4: She likes to precompute her schedule to avoid last-minute stress.
meanings.sent5: The students were asked to precompute the answers to the math problems for homework.

meanings.definition: To perform a computation before it is actually needed.
meanings.sent1: Before running the program, the software will precompute the necessary data.
meanings.sent2: The system can precompute the values to speed up the process.
meanings.sent3: I decided to precompute the shopping list to save time at the store.
meanings.sent4: The robot's AI can precompute the best route to avoid obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The app will precompute the recommendations based on your preferences.
